attributes.action: Get rid of the hazard perception test
attributes.additional_details: I feel like the hazard perception test is ridiculous!! We are supposed to click a hazard on the computer based on someone else's perception! I took my test today passed the questions part but failed my hazard perception by 5 marks i scored 0 on one because my reaction was too quick... Now i have to pay to do the whole test again!!!!! They should get rid of the hazard perception part of the theory test its ambiguous stupid and unfair
